"The 90-year-old farce is definitely showing wear and tear...Still, you could do a lot worse than this epic cast...Ultimately, whether you go for this 'Front Page' probably has much to do with your tolerance for the blockbuster approach to Broadwayâ€”whether you value flashy individual moments and big stars, or whether you prefer a more coherent and transporting experience. Coherent this production is not, but that hasn't yet stopped it from being the most buzzed-about show of the fall."
